overview: When Johnny Riley knocks on the door and is let in by Quentin Gainz the last thing he expected was a fantasy scenario. He finds Jack Hunter and Jacob Durham already fully naked, indulging in head games. Chris Blades has been much more secretive than ever and when Dalton goes snooping and finds a ton of gay porn on Chris' tablet, he's sure he's discovered the secret he's trying to protect. It seems a little bird has told Miles Taylor a secret about Zak Bishop. Rumor has it, Zak is not only the neighborhood slut, he also gives the best blowjobs! Ever since Markie More saw Dakota Young make his debut, he's been locked and loaded to have his way with the newbie.
title: Meet The Fuck Buddies
